backend/main.mo: Defines a posts canister with CRUD-style query methods and date-based sorting, including draft filtering.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates stored posts by adding an isDraft field defaulting to false.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one-line summaries for major frontend files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide outlining build, verification, and deployment steps for the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that loads the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with home, posts list, and post detail routes inside the main layout.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Renders a post preview card using safe date formatting and category badges.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays footer with branding, quick links, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements the top navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper containing header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/content/samplePosts.ts: Exports an array of sample Post objects used as fallback blog content. Includes metadata like slug, author, datePublished, and body text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context and provider using Internet Identity, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching posts from the backend with fallbacks to samplePosts when errors or missing actors occur.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and sets up light/dark theme CSS variables along with global typography and utility styles.
frontend/src/lib/postDate.ts: Provides functions to normalize bigint timestamps and safely format post dates, returning fallbacks for invalid values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero, CTA, features, and post previews using data from usePosts.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Renders a detailed blog post view with loading and error states, category tags, author/date metadata, and formatted post body text.
frontend/src/pages/PostsListPage.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable grid of post cards with category selection and loading placeholders.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and feature definitions for the Zeekly site.
